name: Life in a Box
description:
Life in a Box is a really short game about analyzing boxes. This was made to be a part of an art exhibition called Cismittääkö in 2016. The player is to assist in a research analyzing six random talkative boxes for their gender.

It was primarily meant to be played in the exhibition, since the game tracks the players' choices locally. The game can be played with a keyboard or a Xbox 360 controller.
